name: KillerPro
description:
KillerPro is a prototype, a 3d game demo that i've made in Unreal  Engine 4 back in 2016. This was the first Unreal project i've ever worked on by that time and the 4th game project chronologically in my portfolio.

Controls: WASD +⬅️+➡️+⬇️+⬆️  + Spacebar + Mouse.

For  more  info, please read the ReadMe file.
